Heart¶

namespace: VoldeNuit.Framework

public static class Heart

Heart class is static class that contains information about the overall game system and execute sequences.

Static Properties¶


graphicsDevice¶

graphicsDevice is read-only value that contains reference of the current GraphicsDevice.

public static GraphicsDevice graphicsDevice { get; }

instance_id¶

Returns copy of list of current Instances as read-only.

public static ReadOnlySpan<Instance> instance_id;

instance_id_deactivated¶

Returns copy of list of current deactivated Instances as read-only.

public static ReadOnlySpan<Instance> instance_id_deactivated;

room_current¶

room_current is read-only value that contains reference of current Room.

public static Room room_current { get; }

room_width¶

Gets and sets width of current Room.

public static int room_width;

room_height¶

Gets and sets height of current Room.

public static int room_height;

room_speed¶

Gets and sets speed of current Room.

public static int room_speed;

instance_number¶

Returns number of Instances in current Room.

public static int instance_number { get; }

instance_number¶

Returns reference of current Font.

public static Font font_current { get; set; }



Static Methods¶


InitMonoGameEnvironment(string projectName, Game game, GraphicsDeviceManager gDeviceManager)¶

Initializes environment values.

  • Returns: N/A

Parameter

Type

Desc

projectname

string

name of the current project.

game

Game

Reference of Game.

gDeviceManager

GraphicsDeviceManager

Reference of GraphicsDeviceManager.

 
public static void InitMonoGameEnvironment(string projectName, Game game, GraphicsDeviceManager gdevicemanager) {}

InitResolution(int width, int height)¶

Initializes window resolution on game starts.

  • Returns: N/A

Parameter

Type

Desc

width

int

Width of window.

height

int

Height of window.

 
public static void InitResolution(int width, int height) {}

InitEntryPoint(Type room)¶

Initializes the Room to enter when loading is finished.

  • Returns: N/A

Parameter

Type

Desc

room

Type

Type of Room to enter.

 
public static void InitEntryPoint(Type room) {}

InitSpriteBatch(SpriteBatch spriteBatch)¶

Initializes SpriteBatch.

  • Returns: N/A

Parameter

Type

Desc

SpriteBatch

Reference of SpriteBatch.

 
public static void InitSpriteBatch(SpriteBatch spriteBatch) {}

InitSplashBgColor(uint color)¶

Initializes background color of the splash screen. The default value is 0xffde5bu(RGB).

  • Returns: N/A

Parameter

Type

Desc

color

uint

Color to set.

 
public static void InitSplashBgColor(uint color) {}

InitSplashTextColor(uint color)¶

Initializes text color of the splash screen. The default value is 0.

  • Returns: N/A

Parameter

Type

Desc

color

uint

Color to set.

 
public static void InitSplashTextColor(uint color) {}

Beat()¶

Updates state of the game.

The order of the event is as follows: Begin_Step -> Step -> End_Step

After the corresponding event for all Instances ends, the next event is executed. e.g. A.Begin_Step() -> B.Begin_Step() -> A.Step() -> B.Step()…

  • Returns: N/A

public static void Beat() {}

Draw()¶

Draws contents on game window.

The order of the event is as follows: Begin_Draw -> Draw -> End_Draw -> GUI_Draw

After the corresponding event for all Instances ends, the next event is executed. e.g. A.Begin_Draw() -> B.Begin_Draw() -> A.Draw() -> B.Draw()…

  • Returns: N/A

public static void Draw() {}
